about_the_game:
TANK ZERO is an action-packed game with tanks where players build their own unique tank from various parts, such as the hull, chassis, cannon, engine, and armor. Each time, players can create different combinations of characteristics and appearances for their tank.

There is no specific plot in the game; instead, the focus is on the gameplay and delivering maximum enjoyment for players.

One of the main features of TANK ZERO is the ability to create a customized tank. Each part of the tank has an impact on its characteristics, with the cannon being particularly significant, as it determines the type of shells that can be fired. Players can choose between a standard cannon that fires classic shells and variations, such as incendiary and nitrogen shells. Alternatively, they can opt for a spray turret that uses propane or acid to deal damage to both enemies and allies.

But that's not all! In addition to building a tank, you will also need to choose a pilot and a class. The pilot gives you a passive ability, while the class grants you an active one.

DEMO HAS THE FOLLOWING LIMITATIONS:

1. Only one game mode “Last Stand Mode” is available;

2. The maximum number of players is limited to two;

3. Only one map is available;

4. Some Extra items are not available;

5. Fewer parts to assemble tanks;
